mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY recipe_id DESC
SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE nation_code = #{nationCode} order by recipe_id
SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE recipe_nm_ko LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT a.*, b.like_cnt FROM (SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE user_uid = #{uid}) as a LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as like_cnt, recipe_id FROM recipe_bookmark WHERE uid = #{uid} GROUP BY recipe_id) as b ON a.recipe_id = b.recipe_id ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_cooking WHERE recipe_id = #{recipeId} order by cooking_no
select * from recipe_irdnt where recipe_id = #{recipeId} order by irdnt_sn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_bookmark ( recipe_id, uid ) VALUES ( #{recipeId}, #{uid} );

INSERT INTO recipe ( recipe_id, recipe_nm_ko, sumry, nation_code, nation_nm, ty_code, ty_nm, cooking_time, calorie, qnt, level_nm, irdnt_code, img_url, det_url, user_uid) VALUES ( #{recipeId}, #{recipeNmKo}, #{sumry}, #{nationCode}, #{nationNm}, #{tyCode}, #{tyNm}, #{cookingTime}, #{calorie}, #{qnt}, #{levelNm}, #{irdntCode}, #{imgUrl}, #{detUrl}, #{userUid});

INSERT INTO recipe_cooking ( recipe_id, cooking_no, cooking_dc, stre_step_image_url, timer_yn, timer_m, timer_s) VALUES ( #{recipeId}, #{cookingNo}, #{cookingDc}, #{streStepImageUrl}, #{timerYN}, #{timerM}, #{timerS} );
INSERT INTO recipe_irdnt ( recipe_id, irdnt_sn, irdnt_nm, irdnt_cpcty, irdnt_ty_code, irdnt_ty_nm) VALUES ( #{recipeId}, #{irdntSn}, #{irdntNm}, #{irdntCpcty}, #{irdntTyCode}, #{irdntTyNm});
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.like_cnt FROM ( SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id IN ( SELECT recipe_id FROM recipe_bookmark WHERE uid = #{uid} ) ) as a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) as like_cnt, recipe_id FROM recipe_bookmark GROUP BY recipe_id ) as b ON a.recipe_id = b.recipe_id ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
